header: The art and science of LG Laundry

cards.title: Smart cleaning for tailored care
cards.copy: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles. Built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right wash motions, temperatures and more for the right care for your clothes.
cards.alt: Video explaining the LG TurboWash 360 feature, which uses up to six different wash motions to help clean your clothes.

cards.title: Power meets care with TurboWash™
cards.copy: LG’s exclusive TurboWash™ delivers a complete clean to help you get more done in less time. Based on the cycle you select, our 6Motion™ technology uses up to 6 different wash motions, each designed to get clothes cleaner and help them last longer.
cards.alt: Video explaining how AI technology is used in LG's laundry appliances.

cards.title: A superior wash, with a twist
cards.copy: Deciding between an agitator or impeller? LG is on top of it. Our top-load impeller washer features a high efficiency design that carefully rubs clothes together to break down stains. And LG’s top-load agitator performs a 4-way wash action that move clothes left and right, up and down. Either way, your clothes are sure to get a thorough yet gentle clean.
cards.alt: Animation showing LG's top-load agitator performing a 4-way wash action that moves clothes left and right, up and down.
